Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.quotas

Class MasterQuotasObserver

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.quotas.MasterQuotasObserver
All Implemented Interfaces:
Coprocessor, MasterCoprocessor, MasterObserver
@Private public class MasterQuotasObserver extends Object implements MasterCoprocessor, MasterObserver
An observer to automatically delete quotas when a table/namespace is deleted.
